item.description:
AJC is located in the lower level, rear, of the Workers' Credit Union Center
(Rte. 2A)...half a mile west of the intersection with Rte. 27..
There is an illuminated time & temperature light in front of the building.

Music in its live form is a relationship among the musicians playing and the listeners listening. Great
inspiration and a true feeling of aliveness can be found in the presence and participation of both players and listeners. Live music is good for the heart, soul, mind and body, and can never be truly reproduced by a recording. There is no substitute for the experience, and awareness, of real people doing real things, together and in the present moment.

The Jazz Jam!

Start: 05/17/2009 - 4:00pm
End: 05/17/2009 - 7:00pm

Pianist Phill Argyris

Listeners and newcomers welcome...

Full menu & bar available; bring your appetite!

$5 cover charge

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Acton Jazz Cafe Jazz Jam
